One of the last times she was able to talk to me, before her mind went, before she started to fade away... my will is in the safety deposit box, along with the birth certificates and our marriage license.
You don't care if a sister gets into trouble and loses her position.
You tried to scare me into losing my baby.
You wouldn't want me to lose my job again, would you?
- Well now... when a young man has to ride all that way to get in a little courting... you'd hardly expect him to waste any words talking about the hired help.
It's not "normal" for kids to waste their time on this.
Do your best not to waste my time.
